Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Class dedicated to represent each user that creates a session and can join a Game

  • Method Details

    • getNumOfCompletedObjectives

      public int getNumOfCompletedObjectives()
      Getter method for the number of ObjectiveCards completed by this Player
      Returns:
      an int (from 0 to 3) containing the number of "true"s in the completedObjectives array

    • setObjectiveAsCompleted

      public void setObjectiveAsCompleted(String obj)
      Method used to set the completion of a given ObjectiveCard to True
      Parameters:
      obj - a String representing the ObjectiveCard completed by this Player (1 is the firstShared, 2 is the secondShared, p is the private/personal one)

    • countObjectivePoints

      public void countObjectivePoints(int a, int b, int c)
      Method used to count how many points this Player won by completing any of the 3 ObjectiveCards he can score with (2 shared by very Player and 1 personal)

    • drawPairObjectives

      public void drawPairObjectives(ObjectiveDeck objD)
      Method used to draw 2 ObjectiveCards from which this Player will have to choose 1 to keep

    • chooseObjectiveCard

      public void chooseObjectiveCard(int choice) throws InvalidInputException
      Method that allows the Player to choose from the pair of ObjectiveCards which one he prefers, by using the choice parameter, throws an Exception if the Player gives an invalid input
      Parameters:
      choice - represents the index of the ObjectiveCard chosen by the Player (-1)
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - lets the Player know when he gave an invalid input

    • chooseStarterCardFace

      public void chooseStarterCardFace(boolean face)
      Lets the Player choose their StarterCard facing
      Parameters:
      face - true is face-Up, false is face-Down

    • chooseColor

      public void chooseColor(Color c) throws ColorTakenException
      Method used by the Player to choose their Color (from the available ones)
      Parameters:
      c - the Color chosen by this Player
      Throws:
      ColorTakenException - if the Color hasn't been chosen already by someone else

    • playACard

      public void playACard(int card, boolean face, Coords coords) throws NotPlaceableException, NoPossiblePlacement
      Method used to play a PlayableCard on this Player gameField
      Parameters:
      card - the index of the PlayableCard in this Player Hand
      face - the facing of the PlayableCard chosen
      coords - the position in which the Player wants to play the PlayableCard
      Throws:
      NoPossiblePlacement - if the PlayableCard isn't playable with given parameters
      NotPlaceableException

    • setGame

      public void setGame(Game game)
      Setter for the Game and gameID attributes, used by the join command present in the Game class to link Player with the Game they are playing
      Parameters:
      game - the Game this Player joins
